question: Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification

response.query: Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification

results.title: Company - ZHAOWEI
results.content: Established in 2001, completed its IPO in 2020, Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd (Stock abbr: ZHAOWEI; Stock code：003021), whose headquarter is in Shenzhen City, Guangdong Province with a registered capital of 171.301664 million RMB is an experienced company that designs, develops and manufactures precision transmission systems.
results.raw_content:
About ZHAOWEI
Production
Technology
R&D
Design
Established in 2001, completed its IPO in 2020, Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd (Stock abbr: ZHAOWEI; Stock code：003021), whose headquarter is in Shenzhen City, Guangdong Province with a registered capital of 171.301664 million RMB is an experienced company that designs, develops and manufactures precision transmission systems. ZHAOWEI provides customers with transmission design, mold manufacturing, part production and assembly services. Driven by the mission of “precise, micro, and high torque,” ZHAOWEI has long focused on product research, covering transmission principles& material research, motor & molding design, injection & assembly automation, as well as gear and drive system testing.
Main Products:
●  A wide range of precision gear motors and planetary gearboxes with the following diameters: 3.4, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 22, 28, 32, 38 mm, voltages: 1.5–24V, power: 0.01–40W, output speed: 5–2000rpm, reduction ratio: 5–1500, output torque: 1 gf. cm–50 kgf.cm
●  Encoder and control system modules
Tolling Development
Gear Tolling Design
Tooling design of gear is different from traditional mold design,it need actual experience data to adjust the gear tooth thickness, modulus, pressure angle, also the tooling manufacture can not based on the theory shrinkage rate of material directly, our advantages are:
On the basis of KISSSOFT, we independently developed the parametric calculation software of plastic gear mold cavity according to our working experience. The software can create the model of gear profile and modify the gear shape to enhance the pricision of gear profile .
After the gear model created by the software , it can be used to machine manufucture by the wire cutting and EDM , so that the precision of tooling fabrication is enhanced.
Mold Flow Analysis
2 mold flow analysisers with 8 years working experience on material reseach and have postgraduate diploma .
Can accurately predict the product deformation, shrinkage, position of material lack, air trapped and other defects, also give the corresponding solutions .
Can compare the different tooling desgin and choose a best option；
Optimize the molding parameters to enhance the efficiency of tooling pilot injection .
Gearbox Design
Gearbox Design Platform
Our gearbox design platform is a patent in ZhaoWei Compnay, it can create the precise model of planetary gear system with involute 、bevel gear 、spur gear etc.by the parameter calculation automatically. The advantage of this platform is combinated with the idea design, structure design, gear shape design and mold flow analysis etc.
The platform of gearbox design has obviously characters on the reasonable distribution of modified coefficient ,optimization of meshing angle,slip rate and coincidence area verification . Also, it has excellent advantages in interference analysis, improvement of gearbox working efficience, noise, working life etc.complex technical problems .
Dynamic Simulation and Finite Element Analysis
In the design stage of gear and gearbox, use kinematic simulation to analyse and verify rotation situation and interference position. Also, use the finite element analysis technology and ANSYS Multiphysics module to analyse and verify the tooth surface strength of the arc gear and bevel gear in order to ensure the reliability of product .
Precise Fabrication and Quality Assurance
Precision Precessing Center
Tool manufacturing center have many high-precision processing machines , including AGIE wire cutting and AGIE EDM from Switzerland, Sodick wire cutting from Japan , MAKINO 、 FANUC and RODERS CNC, HAMAI hobbing machine from Japan and Switzerland WAHLI , to ensure the processing precision and enhance manufacturing effeicency.
Quality Control
Many high-precision measurement Devices such as Germany Zeiss coordinate measuring machine, WERTH CMM, Japan Osaka gear measuring center, Japan Osaka gear meshing device, OGP plane detector, Swiss thermogravimetric analyzer (TGA) etc. , to ensure the product quality .
Automated Production
Part Production Center
Injection molding workshop has more than 100 injection molding machines such as Sumitomo, FANAC, SODIC brands. We pay attention to the improvement of molding technology and production efficiency, apply the cavity pressure technology to sort the good and defect parts automatically, also use SAP production information management system to ensure a reliable and comprehensive cooperation management production center.
Automation Line for Components
100% of injection machines are equipped by servo mechanical control to ensure production rate and consistency.
Servo mechanical control can keep automatic sorting.
To increase automation as much as we can.
Assembly Production Line
→ 40 production lines currently for assembling transmission mechanisms, gear boxes and gear motors.
→ 6 automated assembly lines,
production capacity is 3,000,000 units a month .
→ We are always researching and improving the assembly lines, apply the lean production and industrial engineering
technology to the processing of assembly , so that ensure the product quality, enchance production efficiency and reduce the cost constantly .
Automatic Assembling Lines
All auto-assembling lines are equipped with servo manipulator to improve production efficiency and ensure the consistency of production and quality. It applies image recognition, robotic hands and EPSON system with advanced 、stable and reliable processes to cooperative complete gearbox assembly.
Certificates
Market Areas
ZHAOWEI, Micro System Drive System Manufacturer,Our Products are widely used in automobiles,communication devices, home automation,medical applications,consumer electronics,intelligent robots and so on. We also provide customization services for customers
Milestones
ZHAOWEI Established And First Company Logo
ZHAOWEI made its first appearance in 2001 with the dedication in electrical and mechanical industrial.
Core Motor Parts &Precision gear parts
In 2005, ZHAOWEI established the concept of “ Precision, Micro and High Torque” , in which we laid the foundation for our the smallest planetary gear box with diameter 3.4mm and indeed made a breakthrough in domestic industry, and made sure it can be align with key motor parts, served for Panasonic, Sanyo and Sankyo, and key gear parts, served for Canon, Nikon and Asia Optical.
Automotive
gear parts
When in 2008, ZHAOWEI shifted focus to automotive parts, where plastic gears, metal powder metallurgy gears and machine processing gears are all available, and built mutual win-win cooperation with a variety of well-known enterprises including Bosch, Brose, Tokyo Electron, Denso, Toyota, BYD and Great Wall.
Micro gearboxes
In 2009, ZHAOWEI’s micro gearbox appealed to those companies who seek for reliable partners and worked in close collaborations with GREE, Tencent, DOOYA, Somfy, AUX and STANDARD. The refinement in gear parts barely meet the need of ZHAOWEI in expanding it’s
business and influencing more fields.
Micro Gearbox Transmission
By 2011, ZHAOWEI had accumulated substantial successful development experience in motor and gear, and in this year, we put emphasis on micro gear transmission system which could be applied in five major fields: automobile intelligent, communication equipment, medical technology, smart home and consumer electronics. Accompanied with our top priority in quality, we established long-term strategic partnerships with many world‘s top 500 companies such as BOSCH and Huawei. With the incremental improvement in drive gearbox
Drive System
In 2017, ZHAOWEI began to focus on research and develop drive system solutions. This year, we designed motor gearboxes for automobiles, gearboxes for medical electronics, embedded software, and smart hardware.
ZHAOWEI Industrial Park was established and put into use
The successful initial public offering in late 2017 provided ZHAOWEI with enormous impetus to the further advancement in precision drive systems. Our Micro Drive Industrial Park are now in ready, devoted to providing customized intelligent drive services for customers.
ZHAOWEI IPO
In 2020, Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. (Stock abbr: ZHAOWEI; Stock code：003021) got listed on A-shares in Shenzhen Stock Exchange. Also, we won the 6th China Grand Awards for Industry(for micro drive systems of intelligent equipment) and the China Manufacturing Single Championship (micro drive system) at the same year.

results.title: Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd.
results.content: - Drive Systems for Circuit Breaker - Drive Systems for Control Valve - Drive Systems for Switch Valve - Drive Systems for Automated Feed Mixer - Conveyor Electric Drum Motor +more
results.raw_content:
Gear Motor and Drive System Technology by ZHAOWEI
ZHAOWEI is a innovation manufacuter in the area of high percision miniature and micro drive systems technology worldwide,our focus has always been on driving and moving forward. We win when our customers win.We practice customer-centricity, drive employees to continue to grow, and create value for the micro-driven industry.We practice customer-centricity, drive employees to continue to grow, and create value for the micro-driven industry.We insist based on technological innovation, driven by product innovation, and expanding diversified application markets through management innovation, we are at the forefront of the micro-drive field.We believe in strengthen results, encourage progress, advocate win-win, and activate organizations and individuals to continue to struggle through a comprehensive value creation, evaluation, and distribution system.We dedicated to continuously pursue excellence in ideas and actions, keep improving, and surpass ourselves.
The products and solutions from ZHAOWEI open up new opportunities for our customers. We developed
a product line of planetary gears, on the basis of this technological diversity, ZHAOWEI designs drive solutions that are unique with respect to their precision and reliability in the smallest of spaces,their main areas of use include automotive,smart home,industrial automation,consumer electronics,medical technology - no matter what on a large and small scale. Powerful, highly compatible, and easy to install.
Our Product Lines
Application Areas from ZHAOWEI- Moving the World.
As an experienced manufacturer, with our wide range of proven components, comprehensive development competence and decades of experience we transform individuality into standard for you. we are already an integral part of countless applications in a variety of fields. And as a personal development partner, we combine proven solutions with new ideas, thus making sure that the world of tomorrow will get the drive it deserves. It’s always the planetary gear that is custom-fit for you. To find it, we start by listening very closely: A common understanding is always the best foundation for successful relationships.
Planetary gearboxes as if made for you
Information
ZHAOWEI wins Red Sail Award of 2022 Shenzhen Advanced Manufacturing Industry
On December 20th, 2022 Shenzhen Smart Manufacturing Conference and "Red Sail Award" ceremony of Shenzhen Advanced Manufacturing Industry hosted by the Shenzhen Electronic Equipment Industry Association and Shenzhen Intelligent Equipment Industry Association was successfully held at Shenzhen World Exhibition & Convention Center. Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as ZHAOWEI) was honored to be invited to attend this event with the elites from all walks of life to witness the achievements and brilliance of the development of the manufacturing industry.
Read More→
ZHAOWEI is on Shenzhen’s Top 100 Quality Enterprises list
Recently, the 4th "Shenzhen Top 100 Quality Enterprises" list was officially announced. Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. (Hereinafter referred to as "ZHAOWEI ") won "Shenzhen Top 100 Quality Enterprises" by virtue of its comprehensive strength in innovation, manufacturing, and market expansion after being ranked as one of "Shenzhen Top 500 Enterprises".
Great Opening of Dongguan ZHAOWEI
At 11:40 am on July 4, 2019, Chairman Li Haizhou raised the soil and laid the foundation at the groundbreaking ceremony of Dongguan ZHAOWEI, announcing the official start of the construction of Dongguan ZHAOWEI Industrial Park.
Formal onboarding of ZHAOWEI CCO
On the last day of 2022, ZHAOWEI welcomed a special partner who would serve as the Chief Culture Officer(CCO). This CCO is always full of enthusiasm with the look of fearless "Superman", optimistic, cheerful, and likes challenging himself. people who meet him will be impressed by his most sincere smile.
New Technology New Life: ZHAOWEI at Auto Guangzhou 2021
From Nov 19 to Nov 22, ZHAOWEI exhibited for four days at the 19th Guangzhou International Automobile Exhibition (hereinafter: Auto Guangzhou 2021). With the theme of “New Technology, New Life”, many enterprises showed their latest technology fruits to visitors, covering the entire industry chain of the automotive industry.
Read More→
ZHAOWEI to Showcase Drive System for Rollable Screen at CES 2021
We, ZHAOWEI Drive, have confirmed to attend the first-ever all-digital CES 2021, to be held on January 11-14, 2021. From Jan.12 to 13, we will provide Chat Moderators during show hours 7 AM-9 PM (EST).
ZHAOWEI Invites You to Attend AUTO Guangzhou 2021
We, ZHAOWEI Drive, have confirmed to attend the 19th Guangzhou International Automobile Exhibition, which is held from Nov 19 to Nov 22, 2021, at CIEFC • Pazhou • Guangzhou. At the exhibition, ZHAOWEI (Booth: B Zone, Hall 10.2 C06, Stock Code: 003021) will show our latest technology fruits and products to you.
ZHAOWEI Attends CES 2020
ZHAOWEI’s micro-motor drive systems exhibit at Consumer Electronics Show (CES).
ZHAOWEI GLOBAL
REACH
ZHAOWEI has 5 branch companies and 2 subsidiaries in Shenzhen, Dongguan, Suzhou, Hong Kong, and a subsidiary in Germany. Our operations span five continents and 28 countries, giving us a global footprint.

results.raw_content:
Professional Micro Drive System Manufacturer
Established in 2001, Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. (hereinafter after referred to as ZHAOWEI) is a company designs, researches, develops and produces precision micro drive systems.
ZHAOWEI is a National High-tech Enterprise, with headquarter in Shenzhen, Guangdong Province, registered capital 171.4347 million RMB, and is a listed company with stock code 003021.
ZHAOWEI provides customers with transmission design, mold manufacturing, part production and assembly services. Driven by the mission of “precise, micro, and high torque,” ZHAOWEI has long focused on product research, covering transmission principles& material research, motor & molding design, injection & assembly automation, as well as gear and drive system testing.
ZHAOWEI products offer modules and a wide range of customized precision gear motors and planetary gearboxes with the following diameters: 3.4, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 22, 28, 32, 38 mm, voltages: 1.5–24V, power: 0.01–40W, output speed: 5–2000rpm, reduction ratio: 5–1500, output torque: 1 gf. cm–50 kgf.cm, and encoder and control system modules. That is mainly used in the fields of intelligent automotive drive, communication equipment, industrial equipment, smart home, robot, medical and personal care, beauty and health care, sports, 3C, virtual reality, and linear transmission.

results.title: Shenzhen ZhaoWei Machinery & Electronics Co., Lt
results.content: Established in 2001, Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd is an experienced company in research, design, manufacture, and assembly of the micro motor, gearbox, and other micro precision transmission systems. Driven by the mission of "precise, tiny, high torque", we have been putting great stress on product research.
results.raw_content:
Shenzhen ZhaoWei Machinery
&
Electronics Co., Lt
Who we are
Who Are We
Established in 2001, Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd is an experienced company in research, design, manufacture, and assembly of the micro motor, gearbox, and other micro precision transmission systems. Driven by the mission of “precise, tiny, high torque”, we have been putting great stress on product research. Technicians with years’ experience in the precision gear field make up for the R&D dept of ZHAOWEI, covering transmission principle & material research, motor & molding design, injection &assembly automation, gear, and drive system testing. Thanks to “ZHAOWEI” ers’ efforts, we’ve made great progress in micro transmission patents. What we want to do is making regulations for the industry and rebuilding it.
Diversity is an essential part, especially for products used in all kinds of fields. As a professional precision transmission solution provider, ZHAOWEI offers various product lines:
l General motor driver, regulator gearbox and another transmission system
l Precision gear, worm gear, and worm transmission system
l Precision plastic gears, special metal powder injection parts, and integrated assembly components
l A full range of precision gear motors and planetary gearboxes, diameters: 3.4, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 22, 28, 32, 38 mm, voltage: 1.5-24V, power: 0.01-40W, output speed: 5-2000rpm, reduction ratio: 5-1500, output torque: 1 gf. cm - 50 kgf.cm
l Encoder and control system module
The 3.4mm-diameter planetary gearbox developed by ZHAOWEI marked a milestone in the miniature planetary gearbox industry. Innovation has always been a constant pursuit of ZHAOWEI, which is the exact key characteristic that differentiates us from others.
“Made-by-ZHAOWEI” also plays an important part in world intelligence due to its various application. It can be used for
Intelligent automotive component, like electric power steering (EPS), electric park brake (EPB), etc.
Smart health care, like a dental instrument, elliptical pedal adjustment, etc.
Communication applications, like the base station, video conference, surveillance cameras, etc.
The intelligent robot, like a logistic robot, vacuum cleaner, etc.
Smart home, like an electric curtain, sensor trash can, smart Customizedelectronic lock, etc.
What We Can Do
With about 20 years of experience in the precision machining industry, ZHAOWEI is capable of providing comprehensive service for customers, including R&D, assembly, manufacture of brush DC gear motor, BLDC gear motor, stepper gear motor, planetary gear motor, micro gear motor, micro planetary gearbox, etc.
We have developed more than 2,000 sets of plastic gear molds, with modules M ranging from 0.06 to 1.2, including a variety of different gear types, such as spur gears, helical gears, internal spur gears, internal helical gears, worm gears, worms, bevel gears, and racks.
Our products can be divided into polymers and metal when categorized by the material. As far as polymers are concerned, we adopt POM, Nylon, PEEK, PBT, LCP, PPS. When it comes to voltage and size, we manufacture motor and mechanism products with winding voltages between 1.5-24V and with motor frame diameters between 3.4~38mm. Moreover, with the combination of multi-gear and motors, the reduction ratio is between 5-1500.
What We Can Do For You
Besides the standard products listed, what’s dispensable is customization. We can customize our product to fulfill global customers’ needs. We will keep you engaged in every phase of your project - from module design, specifications determination, material choosing, product testing, package, and delivery.
1. Customizable. We can customize all the specifications to suit your application scenarios. We can achieve it not only by altering the existing gearbox specifications but also by developing brand-new transmission solutions.
2. Precision assurance. We import many precision machining equipments from Germany, Japan, and Switzerland to improve machining accuracy, like computerized numerical control precision machining, EDM, gear hobbing machine, wire cutting machines, etc.
3. Quality control. It’s well-known that polymers material can be easily affected by temperature, pressure, cooling duration. Three methods are adopted to ensure product quality.
l Our technician will choose a suitable solution and enhance the efficiency of tooling pilot injection by doing mold flow analysis.
l Independently developed gear mold cavity parameter design software and gearbox design platform can optimize the displacement coefficient and planetary gear tip interference verification to decrease noise and improve the efficiency & life of the gearbox.
l Conformal cooling technology, and cavity pressure technology to improve quality and efficiency.
4. Multi-test. We established the drive module lab to stimulate the use of cases, testing the product performance. It includes loading test, aging performance test, high-temperature test, dust test, rain test, cold &heat &shock test, vibration test, etc.
High-quality products and customer-oriented service are always the essential elements that set us apart. If you are interested in our products or looking for a precision gear motor transmission solution, you are warmly welcomed to reach out to us.
Vision & Mission
Committed to progress in the field of micro-drives to create a smarter and better life.
Core Value
Create value,
Persist in innovation, Continue to strive, Pursue excellence.
Our values
-Customer focus
-Cooperation
-Professionalism
With Customer focus, we mean that we see the relationship with our customers as a long-term partnership. That we listen, anticipate their needs, and help find ideal solutions. That we deliver what they want, in a way that exceeds their expectations. The customer’s success is ours.
With Cooperation, we believe that the team wins. When we engage in each other’s work, we play on the same field. When we share our knowledge it makes us more competitive. When we do our best and show each other respect, we reach success. When we work as a team, we win!
With Professionalism we mean that we take responsibility for our actions and constantly strive to achieve better results. Customers should always be able to trust us.

Product Series Drive Electronics Suitable for positioning tasks and precise speed control, with minimal spatial requirements for the 3-channel encoder. Product Series Gear Components
results.raw_content:
Manufacturer of DC/BLDC/stepper gear motors, gearheads, micro drive modules, controllers.
Support you from customized prototypes, trial testing, assembly to mass production.
Compliance with international quality standardization, more+
Founded in 2001
National Level
One-Stop
ZHAOWEI Expert in Micro Drive Systems
For over 20 years, we have been dedicated to providing customers with comprehensive one-stop solutions for micro drive needs. Through continuous innovation,we empower our customers to succeed in various micro drive scenarios.
Product Center
Brushed Gear Motor
High-torque DC motors using NdFeB magnets.
Brushless Gear Motor
High-torque DC motors using NdFeB magnets.
Right Angle Gear Motor
Using high-performance materials, can operate in a wide temperature range and special environmental conditions.
Planetary Gearbox
Low noise,minimal backlash,suitable for transmitting high torque and high speed.
Spur Gearbox
High efficiency, low backlash, low noise, suitable for quiet scenarios with light loads.
Drive Electronics
Suitable for positioning tasks and precise speed control, with minimal spatial requirements for the 3-channel encoder.
Gear Components
Application
Special Equipment
In the field of special equipment, every gram of weight and every rotation precision is crucial. To ensure product performance and lifespan, ZHAOWEI starting from micro drive scenarios, is committed to ensuring product reliability in high and low-temperature environments.
Smart Mobility
"Intelligence" has become a crucial development direction for new energy vehicles and mobile travel. Currently, ZHAOWEI's automotive micro drive products cover intelligent cabins, electric bike applications, and more, dedicated to providing global customers with comprehensive solutions for intelligent manufacturing in the automotive electronics field.
Robotic
The robotics industry is undoubtedly a vital intersection of contemporary technological progress and economic structural transformation. ZHAOWEI always focusing on cutting-edge technology, starts from the micro drive field, assisting in the practical application of robotics.
Industrial Automation
In the current global wave of technological innovation led by smart manufacturing, ZHAOWEI deeply understands the drive applications and customer needs in industrial upgrading. Based on years of technical expertise and craftsmanship, we have developed platform products such as drum motors and valve actuators, empowering the flourishing development of the industry.
Smart Healthcare
Used in surgical instruments, medical infusion pumps, dental medical equipment, and other scenarios, improving the production efficiency of medical drive products. Committed to helping global medical device customers provide high-quality micro drive solutions.
Smart Consumption
Today, "light, thin, fast" has almost become synonymous with smart consumer products. Since 2001, ZHAOWEI has established a technical route of "precision, small, ultra-thin." In 2014, we successfully developed a micro-gearbox with an outer diameter of 3.4mm. Over the years, ZHAOWEI has relentlessly pursued technological innovation, breakthroughs in manufacturing processes, collaborated with global customers, and driven progress in the consumer electronics industry.

Shenzhen ZhaoWei Machinery & Electronics Co. Ltd. company profile
Shenzhen ZhaoWei Machinery & Electronics Co. Ltd.
Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd was established in 2001,We provide the total drive solution for customers from design, tooling fabrication, components manufacturing and assembly.
Main Products:
Precision reduction gearbox and its diameter:3.4mm-38mm,voltage:1.5-24V,power: 0.01-40W,output speed:5-2000rpm and output torque:1.0 gf.cm -50kgf.cm, precision plastic and metal powder injection parts and assemblies,customized micro worm and gear drive systems, precise electromechanical motion modules,and we can custom products as requirements.
Application: Automobile unit, automatic kitchen & toilet, home applicance, instrument & meter, medical application, personal care, safety monitor, digital carema, model aeroplance and toy, etc.
Vision & Mission
Committed to progress in the field of micro-drives to create a smarter and better life.
Core Value
Create value, Persist in innovation, Continue to strive, Pursue excellence.
ZHAOWEI has large manufacturing capacity with 165 sets of injection machines from Sumitomo, 35 automatic assembly lines. The tooling facility includes AGIE EDM, AGIE wire cutting machine, and MAKINO, FANUC, RODERS CNC.
The manufacturing center has the AGIE wire cutting machine, AGIE EDM, MAKINO EDM, FAUNC, RODERS CNC.
With OSAKA gear meshing device and gear measuring center, ZHAOWEI can guarantee the gear and gearbox high quality and standard which meet or exceed customer requirements.
Grouped by doctors, masters and senior engineers, R & D team provide the customer total solution from design, 3D simulation and optimize, data collecting & analysis, from FAI to mass production.
Gearbox Design Introduction
With self-developed gear design platform which can design and automatically calculate the gear parameters and build simulation model of volute gear-pair, cone gear-pair and face gear-pair, ZHAOWEI has much experience in computer sided design.
Gear Tooth Profile Modification
ZHAOWEI gearbox design platform has a nice performance in gear modification coefficient, meshing angle calculation, gear slip ratio, contact and overlap ratio calibration. At the production development stage, it is helpful to improve the gearbox noise performance, make gearbox life time longer.
Gearbox Dynamic Simulation and FEA
At the gear design review stage, the engineer will use the ZHAOWEI design platform to conduct design simulation and FEA to verify the design parameters and gear strength performance.
Main Products
1) All series of precise planetary gear boxes with diameters of 3.4mm, 4mm, 6mm, 8mm,10mm, 12mm, 16mm, 20mm, 22mm, 24mm, 28mm, 30mm, 40mm, etc. Output speed ranges from 5rpm to 1,500rpm, and output torque ranges from 1gf-cm to 50kgf-cm.
2) Micro drive system with motor and gearbox for intelligent robot and intelligent housing and etc.
3) Customized worm and gear transmission machinery.
4) micro plastic and metal powder injection and molding for automobile and industry application.
Technology Project
All-screen phone camera gearbox
Article Arc Gear in Gree Air Conditioner
Intelligent Robot: Qrobot
The marketing and R&D are two backbones of our development. We make our customers successful by continuous innovation. The company has an independent r & d design team.
.
zhaowei 100rpm Micro Planetary Gearbox 6mm dc Motor 100mA For VR Headset
Low Speed 3v 130mA Micro DC Geared Motor Gearbox 625rpm For Home Automation
Dia 4mm Low Power Low Noise Micro Planetary Gearbox With Stepper Gearmotor

results.title: History Story - ZHAOWEI
results.content: In 2020, Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. (Stock abbr: ZHAOWEI; Stock code：003021) got listed on A-shares in Shenzhen Stock Exchange. Also, we won the 6th China Grand Awards for Industry (for micro drive systems of intelligent equipment) and the China Manufacturing Single Championship (micro drive system) at the same year.
results.raw_content:
Founded In China,Avaliable Worldwide
Established in 2001, Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd is an experienced company that designs, develops, and manufactures precision transmission systems. ZHAOWEI provides customers with transmission design, mold manufacturing, part production and assembly services. Driven by the mission of “precise, micro, and high torque,” ZHAOWEI has long focused on product research, covering transmission principles& material research, motor & molding design, injection & assembly automation, as well as gear and drive system testing.
ZHAOWEI Established And First Company Logo
ZHAOWEI made its first appearance in 2001 with the dedication in electrical and mechanical industrial.
Core Motor Parts &Precision gear parts
In 2005, ZHAOWEI established the concept of “ Precision, Micro and High Torque” , in which we laid the foundation for our the smallest planetary gear box with diameter 3.4mm and indeed made a breakthrough in domestic industry, and made sure it can be align with key motor parts, served for Panasonic, Sanyo and Sankyo, and key gear parts, served for Canon, Nikon and Asia Optical.
Automotive
gear parts
When in 2008, ZHAOWEI shifted focus to automotive parts, where plastic gears, metal powder metallurgy gears and machine processing gears are all available, and built mutual win-win cooperation with a variety of well-known enterprises including Bosch, Brose, Tokyo Electron, Denso, Toyota, BYD and Great Wall.
Micro gearboxes
In 2009, ZHAOWEI’s micro gearbox appealed to those companies who seek for reliable partners and worked in close collaborations with GREE, Tencent, DOOYA, Somfy, AUX and STANDARD. The refinement in gear parts barely meet the need of ZHAOWEI in expanding it’s
business and influencing more fields.
Micro Gearbox Transmission
By 2011, ZHAOWEI had accumulated substantial successful development experience in motor and gear, and in this year, we put emphasis on micro gear transmission system which could be applied in five major fields: automobile intelligent, communication equipment, medical technology, smart home and consumer electronics. Accompanied with our top priority in quality, we established long-term strategic partnerships with many world‘s top 500 companies such as BOSCH and Huawei. With the incremental improvement in drive gearbox
Drive System
In 2017, ZHAOWEI began to focus on research and develop drive system solutions. This year, we designed motor gearboxes for automobiles, gearboxes for medical electronics, embedded software, and smart hardware.
ZHAOWEI Industrial Park was established and put into use
The successful initial public offering in late 2017 provided ZHAOWEI with enormous impetus to the further advancement in precision drive systems. Our Micro Drive Industrial Park are now in ready, devoted to providing customized intelligent drive services for customers.
ZHAOWEI IPO
In 2020, Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. (Stock abbr: ZHAOWEI; Stock code：003021) got listed on A-shares in Shenzhen Stock Exchange. Also, we won the 6th China Grand Awards for Industry(for micro drive systems of intelligent equipment) and the China Manufacturing Single Championship (micro drive system) at the same year.

Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. (003021.SZ)
Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd.
Zhaowei Industrial ParkChaoyang Road Yanluo Street,Songgang Bao'an DistrictShenzhen 518105China86 755 2732 2645https://www.szzhaowei.net
Sector(s): IndustrialsIndustry: Electrical Equipment & PartsFull Time Employees: 1,951
Key Executives
Description
Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, designs, manufacture, and sale of precision transmission and micro-drive systems. The company provides smart consumer electronics for sports health, 3C electronics, virtual reality, and beauty products; smart home products for doors and windows, home office, home appliances, and kitchen and bathroom; smart medical products for detection, injection, to clean, and operation; and automotive electronics for smart cockpit, dynamic domain, automotive injection molded parts, and supporting facilities services. It offers industrial equipment for building security, automated manufacturing, detection and measurement, and industrial communication. In addition, it offers security cameras, gas value actuators, drum motors, manipulator joint steering gears, 5G antenna modules, antenna feeder system parts, automatic feeder drive modules, and automatic inspection drive modules. It
serves mobile communication, medical equipment, smart home, smart car, consumer electronics, industrial equipment, and other fields. Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
